p: The scavenging potency of 2,2-diphenyl-1-picryl-hydrazyl (DPPH) radical of pomegranate leaves and peels, fig leaves, guava leaves and olive leaves crude juices was determined [ 8]. The absorbance at 517 nm was measured to assess the remaining amount of DPPH. Butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) was applied as a standard.
